name: Suprise Party Planner Simulator
description:
This is a game about planning a suprise party for your friend

A lot of features are not implemented, but the idea is:

You look around the house for clues as to what your friend likes, what places they like, what people they get along with etc. 

You can then buy decorations, and invite pople.

If you invite people they dislike, use too much money, or buy things they hate, your score will go down.

As said, all of theese things are not implemented, due to lack of time, but hopefully one day i'll finish it.

Credit:

Nousy - Helping out with sprites

Jan André Østevik - Music
